tables.create_sql: create table if not exists Goods (ID integer primary key autoincrement, GoodsCode varchar(50) not null unique, ModelName varchar(50), ShortName varchar(50), TypeCode varchar(50), DistrictNo int, PurchasePrice decimal(8,2), PurchaseDiscount decimal(8,2), ReturnPrice decimal(8,2), FreightFee decimal(8,2), PackQuantity int, LeastPackQuantity int, Description varchar(500), EnableFlag int, LastUpdateTime datetime)

create table if not exists Guest (ID integer primary key autoincrement, GuestCode varchar(50) not null unique, GuestName varchar(100) not null, Alias varchar(50), GuestType varchar(20), DeptCode varchar(50), DeptName varchar(50), ListColor varchar(20), Sex varchar(10), Phone varchar(300), Phone2 varchar(300), TelPhone varchar(300), TelPhone2 varchar(300), PhoneList varchar(500), FreightStation varchar(100), FreightMode int, Remark varchar(500), EnableFlag int, LastUpdateTime datetime)

create table if not exists Vendor (ID integer primary key autoincrement, VendorCode varchar(50) not null unique, VendorName varchar(100) not null, VendorType int, ListColor varchar(20), LegalPerson varchar(50), Contact varchar(50), Tel varchar(300), ContactExtra varchar(300), QQ varchar(300), FaxTel varchar(300), Email varchar(500), WebSite varchar(300), Address varchar(300), BusinessScope varchar(500), Description varchar(500), FregithWay int, FreightCharge decimal(8,2), EnableFlag int, LastUpdateTime datetime)
